titleInfo.title: Receipt for Sale of Tobacco by Jas. H. Smith [amp] Son for the Account of F. L. Ussery to the American Snuff Company

mods.note: This receipt, incorporated by the Planters` Protective Association documents the Sale by Jas. H. Smith [amp] Son, Elephant and Protection Warehouses of one remnant tobacco to the American Snuff Co. The payment was made for the account of F. L. Ussery.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
